channel.title: Other people can't connect to my server although my ports are forwarded
channel.description: title says it all can you please help me.. i changed the ip in the gui.java and everything and people still cant connect, if you want to teamviewer it it would mean a lot thanks

item.title: Other people can't connect to my server although my ports are forwarded
item.dc:creator: @Luckycharm1 Luckycharm1
item.description:
@Luckycharm1 wrote:

have you made an no-ip and made that as your ip?

item.title: Other people can't connect to my server although my ports are forwarded
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

make an exception through your firewall for the port name # and port type.

/problem solved.

Read full topic
item.source: Other people can't connect to my server although my ports are forwarded

item.title: Other people can't connect to my server although my ports are forwarded
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

italy544:

it says not open… but if i use a diff site it says opened…?? can you go on teamviewer and help me?

I can, but I won’t.

So one site says that the port is open, and one says it’s closed?

Post the links to both of the sites.

Read full topic
